meanings.definition: Consisting of three letters or characters.
meanings.sent1: The triliteral code was easy to decipher.
meanings.sent2: The triliteral symbol was found on ancient tablets.
meanings.sent3: The triliteral puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her triliteral name seemed to hide a deeper meaning.
meanings.sent5: The triliteral pattern stood out among the others.

meanings.definition: A word or form having three letters or characters.
meanings.sent2: In Morse code, SOS is a triliteral.
meanings.sent3: The triliteral in the crossword was the key to finishing it.
meanings.sent4: His name became a triliteral after he legally changed it.
meanings.sent5: The triliteral on the sign caught my attention immediately.
